Emetra.Business.BaseClass Namespace

Summary

Represents namespace Emetra.Business.BaseClass.

Classes
 NameDescription
TCustomBusiness

Business objects are lightweight objects that can be used as base class for more complex objects that contains business logic. Typically they are not used for smaller data objects with limited scope. These may not need a logger, and they don't need to implement interfaces. More complex data objects like TPatient in en EHR application may need both of these. Deriving from TInterfacedPersistent (a standard RTL class) it is not garbage collected and must be freed when it is no longer used. If it it is added to a TBusinessObjectCatalog , the lifetime and destruction is handled by the catalog.
